alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Gibson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:03AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gibson, southwestern Carroll and northeastern Madison Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 303 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Trenton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Humboldt, Milan, Trenton, Fairview, Dyer, Three Way, Medina, Gibson, Hickory Flat, Tuckers Corner, Grizzard, Cades, New Enterprise, Ledbetter, Sitka, Vaughns Grove, Barrons Corner, Georgetown, Laneview and West. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
